name: salta-inteligente
description: Dashboard CÃ­vico para la Ciudad de Salta, Argentina

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:setup
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:migrate --prefix server && npm run db:generate --prefix server

author: Fernando J. Romera Costa
